text: One of the most amusing things about the news that the Mueller Report has finally been filed  with AG Barr is hue & cry on the Left for it to be released "in full." text: Don't miss oldie but goldie reflection on @BillKristol by @julie_kelly2. It's a sad, melancholy piece about a man who has seriously lost his way. If he were not so malicious, Kristol would deserve our pity more than our our contempt.

text: Twitter hilarity.  So finally, at last I am the proud recipient of a complaint on Twitter.  It was for an admiring note about the historian David Starkey’s warning that the campaign against Brexit amounted to an anti-democratic coup. The anti Brexit lobby is alert & sensitive!
author: rogerkimball

text: Exactly.  “the last moral Republican,” forsooth. John McCain was a despicable, grandstanding man in love with one thing: himself
author: rogerkimball

text: The great historian David Sarkey is right: the British establishment are attempting a coup in trying to block Brexit. Something analogous is happening here with the Deep State's (and Never Trump) effort to undo the 2016 election adn unseat @realDonaldTrump
